name: Toggle Tap Balance
description:
This game supports controller input.

How to play

Carefully swap between parrying (beige) and shooting (purple) and kill as many enemies as you can. 

A white line splits and moves along your health bar. If it overtakes your health -- beige or purple -- you'll die, so swap modes to change its direction. If you take damage, look for health pickups and take notice of your health bar's decreased latitude.

If you experience any scaling issues, I encourage you to download the desktop version.
